name: MiniJam111_ProtoScore
description:
Game made by 1 person in ~24h for MiniJam111:Colors². Re-used code for the jam : actor manager and collision loop re-used from previous PICO-8 game

Try to get the best score in this little arcade game!

Shoot Alien from opposite color and avoid touching them. Laser are deadly too.

Warning : your bullet can destroy you if you are from the opposite color!

Control : 

  • Arrow : Move
  • Up : Jump
  • X : Shoot a bullet
  • C : Switch Color
